function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Discussion of disease hotspots and prevention indicating potential for disease outbreak.","Impact":"Unplanned outbreaks leading to widespread contagion and illness.","Mitigation":"Implement proactive surveillance and monitoring systems to identify and address potential hotspots.","Technologies":"Smart surveillance systems, big data analytics, and IoT for monitoring and prediction.","People":"Populations in areas prone to disease outbreaks, public health agencies, urban planners.","Owner":"Public health agencies, urban planners."}]}
